import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-transactions-show-modal', templateUrl: './transactions-show-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./transactions-show-modal.component.css'] }) export class TransactionsShowModalComponent { activeLink: string = 'details'; setActiveLink(link: string, event: Event) { event.preventDefault(); this.activeLink = link; } }
